title: BBQ Ribs
info: BBQ Ribs are a Hardmode food item dropped from various different Hardmode enemies within the Dungeon. This feast gives the player the Exquisitely Stuffed buff. This lasts for 24 minutes, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon () or by double-tapping the buff icon ().
stat:
Type
Food
Use time17 (Very fast)
TooltipMajor improvements to all stats
